\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&& 0 && 0 \\
	&&& I && I \\
	0 & X && {A \oplus X} && A & 0 \\
	0 & X && Y && {A/I} & 0 \\
	&&& 0 && 0
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\binom 01}", from=3-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", from=3-4, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{(\varphi ,\subseteq)}"', from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=3-7]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=4-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow["\subseteq"', from=4-2, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=5-4]
	\arrow[from=4-6, to=4-7]
	\arrow[from=4-6, to=5-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
